content.html: Is anyone else a bit depressed? I thought this was going to be hot girl summer and what we got was variant summer. I just feel sad. I want to sit on a beach with my friends without worrying about bringing a deadly disease to my kid.
content.value:
Is anyone else a bit depressed? 

I thought this was going to be hot girl summer and what we got was variant summer. 

I just feel sad. 

I want to sit on a beach with my friends without worrying about bringing a deadly disease to my kid.
